name: prepend
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to add something to the beginning of something else, especially a piece of data (= information) to the beginning of a computer instruction
trans_examp.trans_cn: 在电脑指令的开头添加

example.eg: If the remote machine is Windows based, prepend the address with smb://.
example.egtrans: 如果远程机器是基于Windows的，在地址前加上smb://。
